title: Consideration of dornase alfa for the treatment of severe COVID-19 ARDS.
text: Consideration of dornase alfa for the treatment of severe COVID-19 ARDS.

similar.title: Treatment of severe pneumonia due to COVID-19 with peginterferon alfa 2a.
text: Treatment of severe pneumonia due to COVID-19 with peginterferon alfa 2a.

The outbreak of the new coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) has spread rapidly worldwide. Until now, no definite effective treatment has been identified. We reported 3 patients with severe COVID-19 treated with pegylated interferon alfa 2a with satisfactory recovery. Based on these observations, randomized studies with interferons should be considered in deteriorating patients infected with COVID-19.
abstract: The outbreak of the new coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) has spread rapidly worldwide. Until now, no definite effective treatment has been identified.
